fields.name: Vodka Revolutions
fields.description: Welcome to Cardiff’s best-loved cocktail bar and restaurant offering premium spirits, handcrafted cocktails, freshly prepared food and the finest party – all under one roof! Situated directly across from Cardiff Castle, Revolution sits in the shadow of the mighty Millennium Stadium.

fields.name: Glam
fields.description: Glam is the next chapter in Cardiff nightlife, promising to be the home of the Capital's best weekly and one off events.

fields.name: Retro
fields.description: Retro is the place to be if you’re looking for that party atmosphere. Spread across 3 floors and with an outdoor terrace, we deliver a fantastic experience for people looking to dance the night away.

fields.name: Pryzm
fields.description: PRYZM is a brand new modern, state of the art and stylish night club concept to Cardiff. A modern day coliseum consisting of 3 new club arenas, a luxurious VIP suite and the ultimate chic and sexy bar experience, containing bespoke designer furnishings with a modern twist.
